original_text: And Ehud put forth his left hand, and took the dagger from his right thigh, and thrust it into his belly:
korean_text: 에훗이 왼손을 뻗쳐 그의 오른쪽 허벅지 위에서 칼을 빼어 왕의 몸을 찌르매

sentences.original_text: And Ehud put forth his left hand,
and took the dagger from his right thigh,
and thrust it into his belly:
